results.title: iCURE - National Cancer Institute
results.description: iCURE supports mentored research experiences for students and scientists in the NCI research community. iCURE encourages the participation of underrepresented individuals.

results.title: AORTIC 2019: CGH engages with partners at the largest cancer research conference in Africa - National Cancer Institute
results.description: CGH attends AORTIC 2019 annual meeting, meets with partners, and leads cancer research and control satellite meetings and sessions.

results.title: Intramural Research - National Cancer Institute
results.description: The intramural research program supports projects conducted by scientists located at NCI.

results.title: New on NCI’s Websites - National Cancer Institute
results.description: NCI periodically provides updates on new websites and other online content of interest to the cancer community.

results.title: NCI Graduate Student Recruiting Program - National Cancer Institute
results.description: NCI’s Graduate Student Recruiting Program provides postdoctoral fellows an opportunity to complete their training in the Intramural Research Program. Learn more about the benefits of the program and how to apply.

results.title: New on NCI’s Websites for December 2017 - National Cancer Institute
results.description: An NCI Cancer Currents blog post that provides an update on new content of interest to the cancer community recently added to NCI’s websites.

results.title: New on NCI Websites, March 2018 - National Cancer Institute
results.description: An NCI Cancer Currents blog post that provides an update on new content of interest to the cancer community recently added to NCI’s websites.

results.title: Research Areas: Causes of Cancer - National Cancer Institute
results.description: Understanding the exposures and risk factors that cause cancer, as well as the genetic abnormalities associated with the disease, has helped us to reduce certain exposures and to ameliorate their harmful effects.

results.title: Research Areas: Prevention - National Cancer Institute
results.description: NCI’s prevention research has a broad focus, from identifying environmental and lifestyle factors that influence cancer risk to studying the biology of how cancer develops and studying ways to disseminate prevention interventions.

results.title: 2018 NCI Budget Fact Book - Obligations by Mechanism and Division - National Cancer Institute
results.description: See obligations for the 2018 fiscal year by budget mechanism and division, including grants, contracts, training fellowships, intramural research, and management and support.

results.title: New on NCI Websites for June 2018 - National Cancer Institute
results.description: NCI’s online collection of cancer information products is constantly growing. See selected content of interest to the cancer community that has been added as of June 2018 in this Cancer Currents blog post.

results.title: New on NCI’s Websites for March 2020 - National Cancer Institute
results.description: See selected content that has been added to NCI’s websites as of March 2020, in this Cancer Currents blog post.

results.title: Research Areas: Cancer Genomics - National Cancer Institute
results.description: Investigating the genetic foundations of cancer has improved our understanding of cancer biology and led to better prevention, diagnosis and treatment methods.

results.title: Celebrating National Minority Health Month 2017 - National Cancer Institute
results.description: NCI and other organizations recognize National Minority Health Month in April 2017.

results.title: What’s New Online from NCI? - National Cancer Institute
results.description: NCI periodically provides updates on new websites and other online content of interest to the cancer community.

results.title: New on NCI’s Websites for August 2016 - National Cancer Institute
results.description: NCI periodically provides updates on new websites and other online content of interest to the cancer community.

results.title: DCEG Research - National Cancer Institute
results.description: DCEG investigators conduct multidisciplinary research to discover the genetic and environmental determinants of cancer and the means of prevention

results.title: Subcontracting Opportunities - National Cancer Institute
results.description: Explore the different ways to find NCI subcontracting opportunities.
